name: imageGetIPTCtag
description: Retrieves the value of the IPTC tag for a ColdFusion image.

params.name: name
params.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

params.name: tagName
params.description: The IPTC tag name whose value is returned.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: This example shows how to retrieve the caption for a JPEG file.
examples.code:
<!--- Create a ColdFusion image from a JPEG file. ---> 
 <cfimage source="../cfdocs/images/artgallery/paul05.jpg" name="myImage" action="read"> 
 <!--- Retrieve the camera make used to take the original picture. ---> 
 <cfset cameraMake=imageGetIPTCtag(myImage,"make")> 
 <cfdump var="#cameraMake#">

examples.title: Using getIPTCtag member function
examples.description: CF11+ Lucee4.5+ Extract the copyright notice for image (https://code.google.com/p/metadata-extractor/wiki/SampleOutput)
